DOC.brief_summary: Participants ask complete three different test ( stand , step assist walk ) experience three different experimental condition test . The three condition type vibratory plantar cutaneous stimulation , include vibratory stimulation , submaximal vibratory stimulation supramaximal vibratory stimulation . In first condition , participant experience stimulation apply part body . In second condition , submaximal vibratory stimulus deliver 90 % participant 's threshold surface foot . In third condition , supramaximal vibratory stimulus deliver three time participant 's threshold . The hypothesis plantar stimulation ( 90 % threshold supramaximal ) elicit increase muscle activity test . If hypothesis positive protocol also present incomplete spinal cord injuried participant .
DOC.brief_title: Can Vibration Stimulation Foot Sole Activate Leg Muscles ?
DOC.criteria: spinal cord injury musculoskeletal neurological disease affect movement balance
